pre_boss_1:
The Wolfs are dangerous
in this area. Beware!
Maybe try defeating some opossums before!

Their leader is dead, but
many opossums are still
ransacking the northern areas.
Go and kill them!

All Opossums share a very thick
skin, so make sure to hit
them hard
pre_boss_2:
Rats are very annoying and
deadly, but they can be
killed easily. Good Luck!

I heard, that a pack of
filthy rats is loafing
around in the west. They
need to die!
